name: flex-plugin-library-internal-call
description: This feature adds a new 'Call Agent' section to the outbound dialpad allowing an agent to directly call another agent

version_details.prerequisite: Dialpad Addon should be enabled for the Flex account before this plugin. Before using this plugin you must first create a dedicated TaskRouter workflow or just add the filter mentioned in details to existing workflow.

attributes.name: TWILIO_FLEX_INTERNAL_CALL_WORKFLOW_SID
attributes.description: TaskRouter Workflow to handle internal calls
